member.name: M:XIVLauncher.PatchInstaller.Commands.CheckIntegrityCommand.RunThreadLimited``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Func{System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Threading.Tasks.Task{``0}}},System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs given tasks, up to concurrent tasks active.
member.param: Functions that return tasks to be run.
member.returns: Enumerator for return values. Note that the order from is NOT preserved.
member.exception: If any of the tasks fail.
